name: Potatoman
description:
This is our first game, how exciting! It's a difficult 2d platformer with no jump button, all about the momentum! If you like games such as "Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy" and "Pogo Stick Rage With Your Friends" this might be something for you! Hope you enjoy! :)

If you happen to stumble on something which ruins your save you can reset it by going to C:\Users\"YourProfile"\AppData\LocalLow\DefaultCompany\PotatoMan and deleting the file PlayerPositionSave.potato

THE TEAM

Programmer: @Slyxes

Sound/"Music": @Leimsound

Art: Dan
